********************************************************************************** ** For all documentation see the project website: www.ActiveScaffold.com ** **********************************************************************************

ActiveScaffold plugin by Scott Rutherford (scott@caronsoftware.com), Richard White (rrwhite@gmail.com), Lance Ivy (lance@cainlevy.net), Ed Moss, and Tim Harper

Uses DhtmlHistory by Brad Neuberg (bkn3@columbia.edu) codinginparadise.org

Uses Querystring by Adam Vandenberg adamv.com/dev/javascript/querystring

Uses Paginator by Bruce Williams paginator.rubyforge.org/

Supports RecordSelect by Lance Ivy code.google.com/p/recordselect/

Released under the MIT license (included)
